SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdministratorView
This class represents the administrator view, extending the main view.
Appointment
Represents an appointment with a doctor, containing details about the appointment date, time, status, and outcome record.
AppointmentManager
AppointmentManager is a controller class responsible for managing appointment operations.
AppointmentSlot
Represents a time slot for a doctor, including the doctor ID and the allocated time slot.
AppointmentStatus
Enum representing the different statuses an appointment can have.
AppOutcomeRecord
Represents the outcome record of an appointment, including details such as prescription ID, consultation notes, prescribed medications, and prescription status.
BloodType
Enum representing the different blood types.
Database
A class for managing the database operations for the Hospital Management System.
DoctorView
DoctorView class represents the view for doctor-specific functionalities in the hospital management system.
EmploymentStatus
Enum representing the employment status of an individual.
FileType
An enum representing the different file types that the Hospital Management System will read from and write to.
Gender
Enum representing the gender of an individual.
Helper
Helper class for supporting functions.
HospitalApp
Main entry point for the Hospital Management System (HMS) application.
HospitalAppView
The HospitalAppView class provides the user interface for logging in to the hospital system and accessing different views based on the user's role.
InventoryManager
Manages the inventory of medications, including adding, deleting, updating, and printing details of medications.
LoginManager
LoginManager allows the user to log in to the hospital system.
MainView
The abstract class MainView represents the base structure for all view classes in the hospital application.
Medication
Represents a medication in the system.
OutOfRange
Thrown by a Scanner to indicate that the token retrieved is not within the specified range.
Patient
Represents a patient in the system, extending the User class.
PatientManager
PatientManager is a controller class responsible for managing patient data, including creating new patient records and updating existing patient details.
PatientView
The PatientView class is responsible for providing the user interface for patient-related actions such as viewing medical records, scheduling and rescheduling appointments, updating personal information, and more.
PharmacistView
The PharmacistView class represents the view layer for the pharmacist in the hospital management system.
PrescribeMedication
Represents a prescribed medication with a name and amount.
PrescribeStatus
Enum representing the status of medication prescription approval by pharmacists.
PrescriptionManager
Manages various prescription-related functionalities such as updating prescription status, submitting replenish requests, viewing recent prescription outcomes, and checking stock levels.
ReplenishRequest
Represents a replenishment request made by a pharmacist to request additional medication.
RequestStatus
Enum representing the status of a request for replenishing medications or appointment approval by doctors.
Role
Enum representing different roles in the system.
Staff
Represents a staff member in the system, extending from User.
StaffManager
StaffManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" allows the user to print staff info allows the user manipulate staff info by updating, creating and removing staff data
TimeSlot
Represents a time slot, encapsulating a specific date and time.
User
Represents a user with a unique ID, password, and role in the system.
